vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for the construction of the Coombs Creek Extension Trail Improvements from Davis Street to Moss Park Project located at the 500 Block of North Plymouth Road - Northstar Construction, LLC, lowest responsible bidder of four - Not to exceed $567,750.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
